page.title: 12THE COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: In the block just east of the block containing Yair house we visited the countryside. and noticed an electrical sub station. There was not much farrmland what there was was at the bottom of the hill. Most was being used for grazing cattle and sheep. The rest of the ground was covered in trees mostly beech and conifers. The path was in a fire break in the forest and was very steep. There was a little stream beside the path but this year there are streams everywhere because it has been so wet. We saw a rabbit run across our path. Beside the path at the top was some fern and weeds also at the top was a dry stane dyke with a fence running along the top of it.
